newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: USDA said trade was slow late Wednesday. Few sales of slaughter steers and heifers closed steady.

Inquiry and demand were moderate. Feedlots were very current. Sales confirmed on 500 slaughter steers and 1,300 slaughter heifers. For the week to date 88,200 head confirmed including 18,000 head or about 21 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle.
Steers - few select and choice 2-3 1200-1250 lbs 69.00.
Heifers - few select and choice 2-3 1050-1100 lbs 69.00; pen select with end choice 1080 lbs 68.00; Pen mixed commercial to choice 1210 lb heifers, heiferettes and cows 66.00.
week to date: 88200 last week: 92700 last year: 36300
